评论详情: Great quality very elegant, and warm. Good for your money. Flowy
If you're looking for quality, this is it. I love this dress. The material is not thin. The cut and style is elegant. Perfect holiday or any special occasion dress.
Gorgeous, flattering and washes well. Great length and doesn’t wrinkle easily. Washes nicely.
I LOVE this dress! I bought it for a family member’s wedding and received compliments on it all night! Beautiful color, pattern, and shape!

Very nice and color true to image. Has a soft velvety texture and comfy to wear! Definitely can wear with a growing baby bump, but consider sizing up. 16 weeks pregnant, 5 ft 8 in weighing 180lbs and wearing a size medium. Probably would have been better with a large if later in pregnancy

评论概述: Blue floor length wedding guest dress
评论详情: This dress fit well and the length was exactly what I needed. Size small I'm 5ft 3 and 130lbs The dress had lose short sleeves and a nice v neck cut. The material was soft. The fabric was light weight but kept me warm. Free flow flowing dress no pockets but overall fit was perfect. The color was as pictured a vibrant dark blue 💙
Love the texture and fit. Exactly what I was hoping for a holiday outfit:

This dress has super soft and stretchy fabric which make it so comfortable. I wore this as a bridesmaid dress and was able to still nurse my baby in it due to the stretchy fabric. I love the style as it was very flattering on my waist. Highly recommend!
Size is perfect, dress fits well
Perfect fit! Elegant! Wore ti a formal wedding and it was beautiful! I’m only 5’2” and with kitten heels it barely touched the floor. Weight 160 ordered a Medium and fits perfectly!
Wore to my brother in laws wedding. Beautiful color.

评论概述: Gorgeous, great fit, comfortable, and sexy!!

评论详情: I love this dress! I'm 5' 2.5" and the length was good, I was worried that it would be too small but it fit beautifully and true to size! Additionally, it is super comfortable!
It was long enough!
Super soft dress with stretch in the right places. Very well made. Ordered large and fit perfectly. 5’6 and 160 lbs. for reference. Arrived quickly
Nice dress for the money.  Ordered med, normally I wear a 6-8 dress and it fit great.  I loved the pattern which makes it look more expensive.
Great fit. Lots of compliments.

I bought this for a Christmas party and I have to say it’s my favorite item of clothing that I’ve ever purchased!  It was gorgeous and so comfortable!  The fit was great as well!  I’m 5’11” and the length was perfect!  I’m so happy I bought this dress :)
This dress is great quality and fits as described. I’m a small and bought a small!

I’m 5’1” and 119lbs. I ordered a Small. It’s very flattering! I ordered several velvet dresses. This one was my favorite. It lays nice on the hips and stomach. I wore it to a Christmas party. I got many compliments! Highly recommend! I love the texture too!
Just loved everything about this dress, from its comfortability to its elegance. The color is stunning.
New fav dress. Very flattering! Feels good.
I didn't think I was gonna like it this much but for me well n beautiful fabric, well made and comfortable. I'm 5 5, 145lb. I got the size Medium. Thank u
Classy velvety material. Wore for family photos!

I wanted a fun dress for Christmas photos but didn't want to spend money. This dress was great, cheap and the quality was fantastic. The weight of the dress seems heavy but it hangs great on your body due to the weight. It was also really warm and comfortable. I will definitely be buying more from them!
Very pretty, fits perfectly, material is so soft and comfortable. Looks beautiful. I bought the rusty orange color, very nice color. Elegant n beautiful dress. Must buy..
Love it! One of my new favorite dresses. Got a lot of compliments on it when I wore it.
Dress is great, but itis clearly light teal, not dark blue in actuality.
I loved this dress. Great Quality. The color was vibrant. The size was perfect.

Fits true to size.  Soft, comfortable.  No need for a slip, it is thick enough alone. Color was beautiful. I think it will be good for me to wear to my son's December wedding rehearsal with a pair of boots.

I received a lot of compliments on this beautiful dress.  I love that it is not only pretty, but really comfortable, too.  The dress has a very expensive look to it, yet it is so reasonably priced.  The reddish orange color is the perfect fall color, too.  I may purchase the emerald green and dark blue also.

Nice dress! Soft and comfortable. Length is perfect. I’m 5’0ft and 118lb. I have narrow shoulders and doesn't have a big chest so the top part is a bit big or loose on me. I wish it had pockets tho that would’ve made it perfect.
Beautiful dress especially for family photos or a wedding! I wore mine for both. So many compliments! I’m 5’10 and size medium and it was chef kiss good!

For the price, I was disappointed in quality. The material was quite thin. I also found the XL to be a bit small, so I would suggest sizing up. It also was shorter than the picture shows. I'm 5'6" and it fell above my ankle, so with heels on it looked quite short. Not suited for a winter dress.
Material is heavy! Beautiful color. But fits large and if you have a smaller bust but need a something larger in the waist- this is not for you. Too large in the bust and shoulders.

I loved a dress that i bought at a much more expensive store and when I saw this dress i checked the styles and the are super similar. I bought the dark wine color and it is. Deep rich color. The fit is perfect and forgiving across different body types. My daughter is extremely busty and it also looks flattering on her. The velvet is soft and the interior is comfortable on my skin.

评论概述: Amazing color and fabric! Size up
评论详情: Runs a little small in my opinion. Wish I would’ve sized up. I ordered a size large. 5’9”, 185, 36DD. Gorgeous fabric !! Looks expensive

I am 55 years old, 5’4”, 155 lbs and I love this dress. As we all know, ordering online can be tricky. This dress is a great buy. It is made well and fit me perfectly. It even hides my menopausal tummy and gives me a nice shape! It accentuates my boobs without exposing them. It’s warm and comfy. I wish they made a shorter version bc I would buy that, too!

评论概述: True to size, comfortable and beautiful
评论详情: Fabric is super soft and comfortable. Easy to dance or move around it. Comfortable elastic waist that defines.
Fit was great, the green color is stunning. My challenge is it isn't as "dressy" as I need but I might wear it anyway just because the color is so amazing. True to size.
The waist was very tight and right under my bra. It did not work out for me.
Great fit. Tts. Wore this for a November wedding- perfect
This dress is really amazing fit and fabric!! Im buying a second one in another color. (5’5’ 169#~ large was perfect!)

评论概述: Gorgeous but size up in chest
评论详情: Aside from being a little thinner than the Anthropology Somerset dress, and not having pockets, I was surprised at the beautiful quality of this dress. The pattern within the velvet is A beautiful floral burnout. The color is a rich auburn. Unfortunately it’s just a little too small for me. I am 128 pounds and 5 foot four. I think the medium would be better. But the flow is beautiful size up if you have bigger boobs or a larger waist line.
Love this dress.  Beautiful color. Not too thick and not too thin. I’m 5’9, around 200 pounds. Size 14/16, but a size large is perfect. Recommend!

This dress comes just as pictured with a beautiful rich dark turquoise color and is of good quality. I usually wear medium (I'm about 5'6" 145lb not very busty) and following the suggestion of other reviews I ordered a size down and it fit good. Slightly snug, but since it has a stretchy wasit band, I prefer it that way. Very flattering a-line dress.
This dress is so pretty! I got it in the teal color and wore it to a fall wedding. The bonus is it’s petite friendly. I’m 5’2” and could have worn flats.
For the price I am BLOWN AWAY. I want it in every color! So stinkin cute! TTS! 5’9, 170lb, ordered a large and it’s perfect
This dress is soooo comfy and true to color!! Looks just like the picture!
Fabric color and quality are really great! The fit is great, I ordered a large. I get a lot of compliments on this dress.
I am in love with this dress.  It’s super comfortable and the color is so rich and vibrant.  Fits true to size.

I bought this dress for a fall photo shoot in October 2024, and it turned out amazing. I am a size 6 or 8 and got the medium. It’s a tad tight on the bust and, but it cinched everything in for me! Highly recommend as it looks, elegant for a low-cost!!!! FYI the wine colored dress is reddd in person…. Not wine colored as shown. I had my photographer darken the color a little bit because it was so bright.
I love this dress so much! I bought it for family pictures and it was perfect! Very flattering and comfortable. I even had someone tell me that my dress MADE the pictures.
Is perfect for the upcoming event
Love this dress!  Good quality!  Beautiful Color! Well Made!  Can't wait to wear to wedding this fall!

The elastic is very tight and was higher up on the dress than I expected.  It accentuated the upper chest more than I liked.  The material, the color and the dress overall is beautiful!  It did not look good on a large chested woman.

I got so many compliments on this dress at my brother in law’s wedding. Soft velvet feel, flowy, and perfect color for fall. I got the size small and it fit me great however I probably could have also done a medium for more length on the bottom as it came to my ankles. I’m 5’6 and 135lbs for reference.

评论概述: Heavy weight, nice quality and fits great!
评论详情: I'm 5 ft 7 and ordered a large.  The dress is perfectly stretchy around the waist and fits so well!  It's forgiving for a variety of shapes and the length is very good--not too long or short. I can dress it up or down with jewelry or shoes. Love it!
Looks great
Attended an outside autumn evening wedding and received many compliments. ONLY downside is, NO POCKETS!!! Would have made the dress 5 stars
I love this dress. Decent quality and gorgeous fit - very comfortable. It wasn’t see though at all, the length was good, I’m 5’2 and the small fell around my ankles so I didn’t need to wear heels.
Fabric is thick and lays beautifully.  Definitely recommend!
This material is very pretty and reflects the light nicely. It moves nicely when I walk. Material is not too heavy. Perfect for a fall event. The blue color is beautiful!

评论概述: Amazing purchase for dressing up or dressing down this fall.
评论详情: Dress was true to size, overall fit was a bit snug in the chest area, which I liked and the cut from waist down was very flattering. The cap sleeve was wide and I love the style of the sleeve as well.  Soft, and comfy. I received many compliments. Would recommend to anyone and would buy again.

Love this dress. It fits true to size and is extremely comfortable. I bought the emerald green and plan to wear it this holiday season. The color is rich and the fabric is elegant. I sized down to a large based on the stretchiness of the fabric and it fit perfectly.

Perfect dress for a summer fall transition wedding. The fabric is very similar to the Baltic Born dresses I own without the price tag. It wasn’t as long as I was hoping but being on the taller side I can’t complain. I got so many compliments!
This dress is perfect. It's lightweight and comfortable. Beautiful color. Ty
One 5’11” reviewer said it went down to her ankles but I’m 5’9” and it only went to mid calf! Very disappointed as the reason I bought it was because I thought it was a maxi dress. Only a midi-dress.
I loved this dress. Bought it for my church’s Christmas Eve services and got so many compliments. Perfect material, the fit was nice. Such a nice royal blue color.

This is the perfect formal dress for winter occasions! The fit is really nice, and I love the quality of the material. It is stretchy, and doesn’t feel too heavy or hot. I will definitely be ordering more colors!
Decent quality, did not fit so returned. Did not like the fabric either.
Very elegant, lightweight considering the material and easy to wash.
Lovely dress. Great quality, so many compliments

评论概述: Product consistent with pictures and description
评论详情: Nice dress! Good fit and comfortable. True to size.
These dresses are beautiful and can be dressed up or worn casually. The dresses are soft, flattering and comfortable. I bought in several colors for winter. Absolutely love them!!

I purchased this dress for the Fall and Winter holidays. It is beautiful and so comfortable. The fit ( I dont like tight fitting clothes), syle, length, color and fabric were perfect for me. I purchased it in the blue, am 5 '5 1/2"" tall and weigh 115 lbs. Btw the dress falls at my ankles. It's a must have!!! 👌
Like the look and fit of this dress

This dress is absolutely gorgeous. The color, dark green is a stunner. I am 176 pounds 5 foot five and I ordered this dress in a large and then again in an XL and have just had a difficult time finding the right size for me. I would say that I initially sized up to an extra large because I wanted to make sure it was very bohemian long and flowy but the extra large was just way too big. So, if you’re in between sizes, maybe consider going down one size because this dress is long enough to size down and you’ll still have the length of a maxi. This is a heavy duty velvet dress, and it looks way more expensive than what it costs. I would definitely definitely recommend. But my advice is to purchase from a seller who allows you to do free returns because you may have a sizing issue and need to re-order to get the correct fit. I made the mistake of ordering a similar dress in a gold, crushed velvet from a DIFFERENT SELLER and the return has been impossible, so I am keeping the very extra large gold dress because I just can’t seem to handle the return. But THIS SELLER is very good and this green dress is worth every penny! You will love love love it. I think I will order it in more colors for different occasions. It would look great with boots, heals or flats. You could even add a sequin duster on top of it for even more glamour or add a sheer floral print duster for a casual look. Or just wear the dress as is, it is beautiful.
Loved the dress. Very good quality. I got a large. Fit true to size.
Very well pleased very nice
Bought it in two colors. Stylish, comfortable and warm!

I find this dress very comfortable but it is definitely form fitting on the top for anyone who is busty. I have to add a layer underneath if I don't want "the girls" on major display. I've been complimented quite a bit when I wear it as the material and pattern is very pretty. It has some minor stretch but not as much as it could so plan accordingly depending on how you want it to fit. My only other minor issue is that the bottom hem rolls for some reason. It's so long that I'm not sure anyone else really notices but it's an odd thing. Overall would recommend for the price.

评论概述: Wanted to move it but couldnt
评论详情: Way too big in the chest, and I'm a D cup Felt really cold because of the material... A liner would help maybe? Color was pretty (navy) and quality of material was there, but it just felt like it wasn't thought out well.
Love this dress! Very comfortable and could wear to a formal party without spending too much.  Got several compliments on it
Perfect! The velvet is a nice weight, the length is perfect for a black tie event, the sleeves are roomy w a nice flare. Fits true to size.

This dress is BEAUTIFUL and what impresses me the most is the COMFORT. It’s almost comparable to wearing sweatpants, that’s how comfy it is. The color is spot on, the length is perfect, the velvet is exactly what I wanted, and it’s flowy with or without a twirl. I highly highly recommend this  dress, 10/10!

I ordered this dress for the holidays. I was very happy with the quality of the material and the construction of the dress. Not only was the dress very attractive but very comfortable. This dress was very reasonably priced as well.
Wore this to a fall wedding. Very comfortable!

Although I ended up returning this dress for a different dress for the occasion due to the weather, I loved this dress. I am 5'10" and this dress is the first dress that actually came down to my ankles without shoes. Tall girl approved! I am regretting returning the dress but will buy it again in the future if I can find the perfect occasion. It was a little low cut but could be taped into place. I am also a size D so that didn't help.
Beautiful dress and very flattering on

This is such a pretty dress. I sent it back due to it arriving after the event I wanted to wear it for. It didn’t take long to arrive, just longer than usual for an amazon order for me. I wish it was available in more light, winter colors.

I wore this for a performance during the holidays, and I plan on wearing it to a wedding soon. It is so comfortable and it's very flattering. I loved the color too.
It’s adorable & comfortable too.  I’ve received so many compliments.

I absolutely love this dress. Wore it for my daughter’s baptism. Received lots of compliments.
Love this dress.
This dress is a dream!! Perfect for a photo shoot in Europe. So comfy and looks high end! I can't wait to wear it again!!!
